title: Track a Courier Parcel
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: CourierCompany
fields.type:
CourierCompany 
 String (required) 

The courier company. Commonly used values include: CourierPost, Fastway, New Zealand Couriers, Post Haste, GoSweetSpot, Castle Parcels



 AccountNumber 
 String (optional) 

Optional account number specific to the courier



 TrackingReference 
 String (required) 

The tracking reference specific to the courier company



 AuctionSoldIds 
 Collection of Integer (required) 

The list of purchase IDs (auction sold IDs) that where shipped with this parcel

fields.name: CourierCompany
fields.description: The courier company. Commonly used values include: CourierPost, Fastway, New Zealand Couriers, Post Haste, GoSweetSpot, Castle Parcels

fields.name: AccountNumber
fields.description: Optional account number specific to the courier

fields.name: TrackingReference
fields.description: The tracking reference specific to the courier company

fields.name: AuctionSoldIds
fields.description: The list of purchase IDs (auction sold IDs) that where shipped with this parcel

returns.description: <TrackParcelResponse> Details of whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.

fields.name: Code
fields.description: More information as to the result of the operation

enum.name: OK
enum.description: Parcel was successfully accepted into the system

enum.name: ParcelAlreadyExists
enum.description: A duplicate parcel already exists in the system

enum.name: MemberIsNotSeller
enum.description: This member did not create one or more of the supplied listing reference ids

enum.name: InvalidAuctionSoldIds
enum.description: One or more of the sold listing ids do not exist

enum.name: AuctionSoldIdsEmpty
enum.description: Need to specify at least one auction sold id

enum.name: AuctionSoldIdsArentForTheSameBuyer
enum.description: All auctions must be for the same buyer

fields.name: CourierParcelId
fields.description: The id of the newly tracked parcel
